channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+1867] Santa 404 Troll (pic)
[+1690] The Truth (pic)
[+1646] The Futuristic World of 2010 [Comic]
[+1451] Now THIS is how Wonder Woman's New Costume Should Be
item.description: It took a real Wonder Woman fan to improve on the official version. What do you think?

item.title: [+1367] 238 presidential scholars: Bush worst leader of modern era
item.description: It's one thing for a coterie of liberals at a late-night Washington soirée to say that George W. Bush was the worst president in their lifetimes. It's another thing when the same is said by the nation's 238 leading presidential scholars, who have been polled annually for the last 28 years.

item.title: [+1283] "M. Night Shyamalan's THE LAST AIRBENDER is a hate crime"
item.description: "I'm going to speak plainly in a language everyone can understand. M. Night Shyamalan's THE LAST AIRBENDER is a hate crime against film lovers. No one should ever have to endure what I was unexpectedly put through yesterday afternoon watching this murky 3-D shitstorm of a movie that appears to have been shot through unflushed toilet bowl water"

item.title: [+1176] The Super Smash Bros. Secret That Took 7 Years To Unlock
item.description: It's one of those urban legend glitches and it actually turned out to be true!

item.title: [+1119] iPhone 4 'holding' problem finally fixed... (PIC)
item.description: The solution is actually pretty simple.

item.title: [+1063] I'm sure this will stop you [Pic]
[+1044] Dutch dump Brazil out
item.description: Felipe Melo had an afternoon to forget as his own goal cancelled out Robinho's opener against Netherlands and he was sent off for a stamp on Arjen Robben.

item.title: [+938] Wait Ya Lemme Confirm..
[+914] Bob Jones University Textbook Explains Electricity [pic]
item.description: Even scarier? Over 1 million children use these textbooksto learn science.

item.title: [+860] Tonight Show Has Worst Quarter Since Letterman Went To CBS
item.description: There's big news on the late night TV battlefront today: The Tonight Show with Jay Leno posted its lowest-rated Q2 -- the first full quarter since Leno came back as host after Conan O'Brien was dumped -- since the Late Show with David Letterman launched on CBS in 1993.

item.title: [+706] Presidential Approval Ratings Over The Past 50 Yrs
item.description: A look at U.S. presidents' job-approval ratings from Harry Truman through Obama.

item.title: [+659] xkcd: DFS
[+581] Woman Jailed 2 Days for Filming Movie Screen Sues Theater
item.description: A 22-year-old woman jailed two days in November after being arrested for filming two brief snippets of a motion picture is lashing back at the theater, claiming its manager demanded her arrest despite the police department’s reluctance.

item.title: [+547] Turtle Burgers (Pic)
item.description: Ground beef, cheese, and hotdogs all wrapped in bacon. Need I say more?

item.title: [+511] NPR: A Very Scary Light Show: Exploding H-Bombs In Space
item.description: Back in 1962, the U.S. blew up a hydrogen bomb, creating what might be the greatest fireworks spectacular ever. People in Hawaii gathered on rooftops, sipping drinks, as they watched a radioactive rainbow display in the night sky.

item.title: [+497] Why Apple's iPhone 4 Bumper Case Is A Rip-Off
item.description: Apple doesn't typically get into the case-selling business, but it now sells multi-colored Bumpers to use with the iPhone 4. Are these things really worth $29 apiece? We don't think so.

item.title: [+487] Firefox: The Official Browser of IBM
item.description: Mozilla's Firefox just became the official browser of IBM. The announcement came on Bob Sutor's blog this morning and means that tens of thousands of new users will be downloading Firefox at work - and, quite possibly, many will do it at home as well.
